title: Tips & Tricks for Working with Large Datasets
description: The Avito challenge uses a number of files that, when we are adding features or doing train-test-splits, can consume more memory than some people have available. In this notebook, we will be looking at a few things we can do to save memory and increase the overall workflow speed from loading data to creating numerical features.
